title: Fonts to identify please.
content:
Hi guys,  
could you help me to identify these fonts ?  
The first one look very similar to Caslon Swashes but it's not...

THX a lot in advance for your help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3082522089\_1\_11\_L03VAbWL.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/typophile.com/files/3082522089_1_11_L03VAbWL.jpg) | 27.54 KB |
| [cactus.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/typophile.com/files/cactus.png) | 28.25 KB |
| [Bite Me.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/typophile.com/files/Bite%20Me.jpg) | 89.75 KB |
| [JONAH.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/typophile.com/files/JONAH.png) | 12.29 KB |
author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content:
You're right, was too hasty to conclude. Good news, I found it. Should be [Montserrat](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Montserrat).  
"Bite Me" and "LES PARISIENNES DE KIRAZ" are also interesting but haven't found any match yet... Have you more information? Origin, more samples, website, book name... I've found many versions of Caslon-ish Italic swashes but unfortunately none is matching.

Haas Caslon Swash Capitals, as shown in Jaspert's Type Encyclopedia of 1970, appear to be a match for "LES PARISIENNES DE KIRAZ."  
There are several digital Caslon swash italics that are similar but not a match:  
 [Adobe Caslon Pro Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/caslon/italic/glyphs.html).  
 [ITC Caslon Italic Swashes](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/caslon-italic-and-swashes/caslon-italic-swashes/).  
 [Caslon Italic With Swashes LET](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/caslon-italic-with-swashes/italic-with-swashes/).  
 [URW+++ Caslon No540 Swash D Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/caslon-no-540/caslon-no540-swash-d-italic/glyphs.html%3Cbr%20/%3E).  
 [URW+++ Caslon No337 Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/caslon-no337/sc-t-italic/glyphs.html).  
Don

I have been searching for this font till i came across this forum...I cannot find this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206im_/http:/typophile.com/files/046e1782b8a8d0b951da20ac60876631_4171.jpg)

@snake2404  
Next time try to start your own thread. For the answer, have a look to [Radiant](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Radiant), you should find the font you're after.

@wonderfulgreg  
Bite Me: Motion Picture by Måns Grebäck ( [commercial](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/motion-picture) - [personal](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823051206/http:/www.dafont.com/motion-picture.font))
